casebody.data:
No. D-2574. In the Matter of Discipline of Gary R. LeBlanc. 562 U.S. 818, 131 S. Ct. 411,

178 L. Ed. 2d 275,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 7577. October 4, 2010.

Gary R. LeBlanc, of Gardner, Massachusetts, is suspended from the practice of law in this Court and a rule will issue, returnable within 40 days, requiring him to show cause why he should not be disbarred from the practice of law in this Court.
